import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import context from './usecontext' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const Addtocart = () => { const[cartdata,setcartdata]=useState([]) const{orderid,setorderid}=useContext(context) const[tprice,settprice]=useState() const navigate=useNavigate() useEffect(()=>{ addcart() },[]) const increament1=(index)=>{ const update=[...cartdata] update[index].qnt+=1 setcartdata(update) grandtotal(update) } const grandtotal=(cart)=>{ const totalprice=cart.reduce((acc,data)=>acc+data.productprice*data.qnt,0) settprice(totalprice) } const decreament1=(index)=>{ const update=[...cartdata] if(update[index].qnt>1){ update[index].qnt-=1 setcartdata(update) grandtotal(update) } } const addcart=async()=>{ try{ const res=await fetch("http://localhost:9000/api/cartdata",{ method:"get" }) if(res.ok){ const result=await res.json() if(result.statuscode===1){ const updatecart=result.data.map(item=>({ ...item, qnt:item.productquantity ||1 }) ) setcartdata(updatecart) grandtotal(updatecart) } else{ alert("data didn't fetch") } } }catch(err){ alert(err) } } const checkout=()=>{ var r=Math.random(100000,10000000) setorderid(r) navigate("/checkout") } return (
Your cart will be expired in minutes!
check out

) } export default Addtocart
